name: Leap Bounder
description:
A simple platform game where you are unable to jump. 

***Currently having issues with assets not loading in itch***

Please try the game here: https://leap-bounder.herokuapp.com/

Made with Node.js and Phaser 3 for the web browser.

Source Code available at: https://github.com/ian-antking/leap-bounder

Features I would like to add:

  • Music
  • Backgrounds
  • Moving Platforms
  • Saving
  • Different Enemy Types
  • Switches
  • More Animations
